name: 乔尔·施奈德
name_full: 乔尔·施奈德 Joel P. Schneider

last_movies.title: 造就美国的食物 第一季

introduction: Joel P. Schneider is a writer, producer and sometimes-actor residing in Brooklyn, NY. A born and bred dairy farmer from Wisconsin, he lived the corporate life in his 20's and eventually found his way to Toronto where he held spit buckets on infomercials and became a film office copier shaman. Since then he's written and produced a number of award winning shorts as well as crowd pleasing content for History Channel, NBC and more.
